comments.author: roman reigns

comments.text:
This world is full of dumbasses, they're treating Paul Walker like he was 
some kind of GOD. People are acting as if Paul Walker jumped on a live hand 
grenade to save a fellow soldier in combat in Iraq. He was nothing but a 
fukin pretty boy hollywood actor, a lousy actor at best, who died by 
sitting in the passenger seat of a fancy fast car with a race car drving 
speed demon behind the wheel. And all his follows are dumber than Justin 
Bieber fans. Let's not forget this is the same dude who cared so much about 
the poor crashed and burned in a Half-a-million dollar car. AND YES I KNOW 
HE WASN'T DRIVING!!..Everyone who last saw him and his 'race car driver' 
friend said they were going out to test the speed of that car. This dude 
told kids to don't speed because F/F movies had stuntmen and professional 
drivers, then he goes out and sit in the passenger seat next to a speed 
demon. Lets use common sense for once. Paul Walker said don't cry for him 
if he died speeding, those are the words of an adrenalin junkie, so I'm not 
goin to cry for him, in fact fuk him. And don't give me this crap about his 
charity work because there are plenty of  people alive right now tht devote 
their lives to charity work who don't speed﻿
comments.author: Corey Anderson

comments.text:
+Corey Anderson Geez dude, I know he 'was an actor'. Also a human being and 
nice guy. God knows how you can be such a bitter asshole about it all as if 
he was your enemy, you have serious psychological problems. 'Fuk him'?! 
What an asshole!
comments.author: Simon Vance

comments.text:
Quit being a dumbass. No one will ever care about you. You're just a 
fucking baby.
comments.author: J-Allen22

comments.text:
+Corey Anderson How can you be so heartless? This was a person who 
obviously made an impact, a positive one too for many people. Paying homage 
to someone is treating him like a God? People paying their respects to such 
a tragedy is disgusting to you?? So I'm guessing when you die you don't 
want people to give a shit. YOU are clearly the dumbass who has no sense of 
emotion. & What does having an expensive car have to do with caring for the 
poor???? Did you even watch the video or did you just start ranting before 
you read it? He was NEVER really in the spotlight, he was such a humble 
person you could SEE it & this was said by countless people in interviews 
and just casually. Would a cocky person take a group to Haiti to help out? 
You need people to genuinely care about in your life because having these 
hateful thoughts about someone who died in such an awful way is very stupid.
